ValidationRule.description: User should fill atleast one ERP ID field out of available 4 fields (P20 Logistic ID,Blue Planet ID,QTC ID,ngERP ID)
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(ISPICKVAL(HWS_Address_Status__c, '')), NOT(ISPICKVAL(HWS_Address_Status__c, 'Temporary Address')), RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Logistic_Account', ISBLANK(P20_Logistic_ID__c ), ISBLANK(Blue_Planet_ID__c), ISBLANK(ngERP__c), ISBLANK(QTC_ID__c) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please fill atleast one ERP ID
